messages.subject: new unschooling books
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all.  It seems that there are a few new unschooling books out there, and I m wondering what they are.... I like to be able to give recommendations to other
messages.messageBody:
Hi all.  It seems that there are a few new unschooling books out
there, and I'm wondering what they are.... I like to be able to give
recommendations to other people in our local group.  I've got Rue's
book. 

I believe Dayna Martin has a new book out, not sure of the name. 
Also, does Sandra have a new book coming out? (I have her Puddles
essays book)

Does anyone else know of any other books out there right now? 
Valerie Fitzenreiter (don't think I spelled that right) has been
working on a new one too, not sure when it is coming out.

I know there are these great lists, and lots of blogs too, I'm just
trying to track down the new books as they come out.  Since they are
usually publised by small publishers, they're not something people will
find on the Barnes&Noble website...

thanks,

Amanda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
